product_name: Wahoo Fitness TICKR X Fitness Monitor
long_description: Combining features from GPS watches, heart rate monitors and fitness apps in a low-profile chest strap design, the TICKR X Fitness Monitor records workout data to help you gauge your training.
short_description: Combining features from GPS watches, heart rate monitors and fitness apps in a low-profile chest strap design, the TICKR X Fitness Monitor records workout data to help you gauge your training.
